attributes.background: My son was stillborn 16yrs ago my ex signed the deeds as a result I have no rights, I can't have the lettering done without his permission. In 14yrs my son's grave needs paying for otherwise they can remove him my ex won't pay. I'm asking for the same rights as a mother of a living child.

rejection.details:
We were so sorry to read about the loss of your son. Please accept our condolences.

We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. It is not clear from your petition what specific rights you would like the UK Government and Parliament to grant to the parents of children who are stillborn. You could start a petition outlining what specific action you would like the Government and Parliament to take.
